Posts.Content: General question to all :- if u had a faulty gene (palb2) with triple negative breast cancer would u have : - Radiotherapy to 1 breast as planned or a propheitic double mastectomy??? Thats my choice?
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy or propheitic double mastectomy

Posts.Content: Thanks for yr reply...ive only had a week to think about it really so not much time.....i like my breasts & dont want to lose them but it may give me piece of mind of the chances of the cancer not returning and not having to start the treatment again..... Ive been very lucky so far with treatment, pain etc. The surgeon keeps telling me that itsa massive operation with more risks & complications.
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy or propheitic double mastectomy

Posts.Content: Thankyou.. Im erring towards DM and reconstruction.  My faulty gene Palb2 is quite rare & they are not sure how high risk it is yet but think it could be the new Braca3. Ive got 3 kids to think about who need me & because i have triple negative breast cancer the risk is there.  You sound like you are doing great! I could have radiotherapy then wait but it makes the operation more risky later on .
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy or propheitic double mastectomy

Posts.Content: Just been diagnosed with this and been offered prophetic double mastectomy. ... Ive had triple negative breast cancer with lumpectomy & chemotherapy....ive got choice of radiotherapy or prophetic double mastectomy... Got to make a very quick decision ...any advice please?
Posts.Title: Palb2

Posts.Content: Thanks... I think i want to get it over & done with them hopefully carry on with my life. My surgeon told me its a big decision & she couldnt choose..err not very helpful . She said theres risks & complications with a DM. Thanks
